languages.text: "И что же ты хочешь услышать, шерин? Сказку о прекрасной принцессе? Балладу о королеве разбойников?" {n}Джай кривится от собственных слов и грубо, по-солдатски, сплевывает под ноги.{/n} "Как тебе такая сказочка, шерин: жила-была девочка на куске камня, покрытом песком, в сердце которого таились несметные богатства для слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. И до шестнадцати лет эта девочка, надрывая легкие и спину, своими ручонками гребла блага для тех, кого никогда не видела и кто никогда о ней не узнает. А затем..."

"So what do you want to hear, shereen? A children's tale about a beautiful princess? A ballad about a queen of thieves?" {n}Jae cringes at her own words and with all the crudeness of a veteran soldier spits on the floor.{/n} "How about a new story, shereen? Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name. She did this every day until she turned sixteen. And then..."
languages.original_text: "И что же ты хочешь услышать, шерин? Сказку о прекрасной принцессе? Балладу о королеве разбойников?" {n}Джай кривится от собственных слов и грубо, по-солдатски, сплевывает под ноги.{/n} "Как тебе такая сказочка, шерин: жила-была девочка на куске камня, покрытом песком, в сердце которого таились несметные богатства для слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. И до шестнадцати лет эта девочка, надрывая легкие и спину, своими ручонками гребла блага для тех, кого никогда не видела и кто никогда о ней не узнает. А затем..."

languages.text: “那你想听些什么呢，亲爱的？是关于美丽公主的童话故事？还是关于盗贼女王的民谣？”{n}婕伊为自己的话感到难堪。她带着老兵的粗鲁举止，朝地上吐了口口水。{/n}“不如我来讲个新故事吧，亲爱的？很久以前，有个小女孩住在一块被沙子覆盖的岩石上。而岩石的核心区域，为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的仆人准备了不计其数的财富。那个女孩十六岁之前的每一天，都在努力地用她的小手回收那些财富。她的后背要累断了，肺里也灌满了沙子。她努力工作，仅仅是为了那些根本不会看她一眼，也不会知道她叫什么的人们。在那之后……”
languages.original_text: "So what do you want to hear, shereen? A children's tale about a beautiful princess? A ballad about a queen of thieves?" {n}Jae cringes at her own words and with all the crudeness of a veteran soldier spits on the floor.{/n} "How about a new story, shereen? Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name. She did this every day until she turned sixteen. And then..."

traits.locale_text: “那你想听些什么呢，亲爱的？是关于美丽公主的童话故事？还是关于盗贼女王的民谣？”{n}婕伊为自己的话感到难堪。她带着老兵的粗鲁举止，朝地上吐了口口水。{/n}“不如我来讲个新故事吧，亲爱的？很久以前，有个小女孩住在一块被沙子覆盖的岩石上。而岩石的核心区域，为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的仆人准备了不计其数的财富。那个女孩十六岁之前的每一天，都在努力地用她的小手回收那些财富。她的后背要累断了，肺里也灌满了沙子。她努力工作，仅仅是为了那些根本不会看她一眼，也不会知道她叫什么的人们。在那之后……”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué quiere que le cuente, shereen? ¿Una historia infantil sobre una bella princesa? ¿Una balada sobre la reina de los ladrones?». {n}Jae hace una mueca ante sus propias palabras y, con toda la delicadeza de un soldado veterano, escupe en el suelo.{/n} «¿Y si le cuento una nueva historia, shereen? Hace mucho tiempo, había una niña pequeña que vivía en una roca cubierta de arena cuyo núcleo contenía riquezas sin fin para los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. La niña excavaba esas riquezas con sus manitas, destrozándose la espalda y tosiendo trocitos de pulmón para el beneficio de gente que jamás la había visto y jamás sabría su nombre. Repitió este proceso cada día hasta que cumplió los dieciséis. Y entonces...».
languages.original_text: "So what do you want to hear, shereen? A children's tale about a beautiful princess? A ballad about a queen of thieves?" {n}Jae cringes at her own words and with all the crudeness of a veteran soldier spits on the floor.{/n} "How about a new story, shereen? Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name. She did this every day until she turned sixteen. And then..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué quiere que le cuente, shereen? ¿Una historia infantil sobre una bella princesa? ¿Una balada sobre la reina de los ladrones?». {n}Jae hace una mueca ante sus propias palabras y, con toda la delicadeza de un soldado veterano, escupe en el suelo.{/n} «¿Y si le cuento una nueva historia, shereen? Hace mucho tiempo, había una niña pequeña que vivía en una roca cubierta de arena cuyo núcleo contenía riquezas sin fin para los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. La niña excavaba esas riquezas con sus manitas, destrozándose la espalda y tosiendo trocitos de pulmón para el beneficio de gente que jamás la había visto y jamás sabría su nombre. Repitió este proceso cada día hasta que cumplió los dieciséis. Y entonces...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それで、何が聞きたいんだい、シャリーン？美しい王女の童話？盗賊の女王のバラード？」{n}ジェイは自分の言葉に思わず身震いし、ベテラン兵士のように荒っぽく床につばを吐いた。{/n}「新しい物語はどうだい？昔々、砂に覆われた岩の塊の上に住んでいた少女がいた。その岩の核には、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}しもべのための計り知れない富が詰まっているとされていた。少女はその小さな手で富をかき出し、背中を壊し、肺を咳き込みながら、彼女を見たこともなく、彼女の名前を知ることもない人々のために働いた。彼女は16歳になるまで毎日そうしていた。そして…」
languages.original_text: "So what do you want to hear, shereen? A children's tale about a beautiful princess? A ballad about a queen of thieves?" {n}Jae cringes at her own words and with all the crudeness of a veteran soldier spits on the floor.{/n} "How about a new story, shereen? Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name. She did this every day until she turned sixteen. And then..."

traits.locale_text: 「それで、何が聞きたいんだい、シャリーン？美しい王女の童話？盗賊の女王のバラード？」{n}ジェイは自分の言葉に思わず身震いし、ベテラン兵士のように荒っぽく床につばを吐いた。{/n}「新しい物語はどうだい？昔々、砂に覆われた岩の塊の上に住んでいた少女がいた。その岩の核には、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}しもべのための計り知れない富が詰まっているとされていた。少女はその小さな手で富をかき出し、背中を壊し、肺を咳き込みながら、彼女を見たこともなく、彼女の名前を知ることもない人々のために働いた。彼女は16歳になるまで毎日そうしていた。そして…」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Alors, shereen, qu'est-ce que vous voulez entendre ? Vous voulez que je vous raconte l'histoire d'une magnifique princesse ? Ou que je vous chante la ballade de la reine des voleuses ? » {n}Jae grimace à ses propres mots et crache avec l'élégance d'un soldat vétéran.{/n} « Non, j'ai mieux que ça. Il était une fois une petite fille qui vivait sur un rocher couvert de sable dont le noyau regorgeait de richesses convoitées par les serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Pendant des années, la fillette s'est cassé le dos et oxydé les poumons à extraire ces richesses de ses propres mains pour des gens qui jamais n'avaient posé les yeux sur elle et ignoraient jusqu'à son nom. Jusqu'au jour de ses seize ans. Ce jour-là... »
languages.original_text: "So what do you want to hear, shereen? A children's tale about a beautiful princess? A ballad about a queen of thieves?" {n}Jae cringes at her own words and with all the crudeness of a veteran soldier spits on the floor.{/n} "How about a new story, shereen? Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name. She did this every day until she turned sixteen. And then..."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, shereen, qu'est-ce que vous voulez entendre ? Vous voulez que je vous raconte l'histoire d'une magnifique princesse ? Ou que je vous chante la ballade de la reine des voleuses ? » {n}Jae grimace à ses propres mots et crache avec l'élégance d'un soldat vétéran.{/n} « Non, j'ai mieux que ça. Il était une fois une petite fille qui vivait sur un rocher couvert de sable dont le noyau regorgeait de richesses convoitées par les serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Pendant des années, la fillette s'est cassé le dos et oxydé les poumons à extraire ces richesses de ses propres mains pour des gens qui jamais n'avaient posé les yeux sur elle et ignoraient jusqu'à son nom. Jusqu'au jour de ses seize ans. Ce jour-là... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Also, was wollt Ihr hören, Shereen? Ein Ammenmärchen über eine schöne Prinzessin? Eine Ballade über eine Königin der Diebe?" {n}Jae verzieht ob ihrer eigenen Worte das Gesicht und spuckt grob, wie es eigentlich nur erfahrene Soldaten können, auf den Boden.{/n} "Wie wäre es mit einer neuen Geschichte, Shereen? Es war einmal ein kleines Mädchen, das lebte auf einem sandbedeckten Felsen, und der Kern dieses Felsens enthielt atemberaubende Reichtümer für Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Das Mädchen kratzte diese Reichtümer mit den kleinen Händen aus dem Boden und zerstörte sich dabei den Rücken und die Lungen für Leute, die sie noch nie gesehen hatten und niemals ihren Namen kennen würden. Das tat sie jeden Tag, bis sie sechzehn wurde. Und dann ..."
languages.original_text: "So what do you want to hear, shereen? A children's tale about a beautiful princess? A ballad about a queen of thieves?" {n}Jae cringes at her own words and with all the crudeness of a veteran soldier spits on the floor.{/n} "How about a new story, shereen? Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name. She did this every day until she turned sixteen. And then..."

Eine Ballade über eine Königin der Diebe?" {n}Jae verzieht ob ihrer eigenen Worte das Gesicht und spuckt grob, wie es eigentlich nur erfahrene Soldaten können, auf den Boden.{/n} "Wie wäre es mit einer neuen Geschichte, Shereen? Es war einmal ein kleines Mädchen, das lebte auf einem sandbedeckten Felsen, und der Kern dieses Felsens enthielt atemberaubende Reichtümer für Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Das Mädchen kratzte diese Reichtümer mit den kleinen Händen aus dem Boden und zerstörte sich dabei den Rücken und die Lungen für Leute, die sie noch nie gesehen hatten und niemals ihren Namen kennen würden. Das tat sie jeden Tag, bis sie sechzehn wurde. Und dann ..."

languages.original_text: "So what do you want to hear, shereen? A children's tale about a beautiful princess? A ballad about a queen of thieves?" {n}Jae cringes at her own words and with all the crudeness of a veteran soldier spits on the floor.{/n} "How about a new story, shereen? Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the Imperium. The girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name. She did this every day until she turned sixteen. And then..."

languages.text: "Ne duymak istiyorsun şirinim? Güzel prensesli bir çocuk masalı mı? Hırsızların kraliçesiyle ilgili içli bir şarkı mı?" {n}Bizzat kendi sözleri, Jae'ın yüzünü ekşitmesine sebep oluyor. Yere, ancak deneyimli bir savaşçıdan beklenebilecek kadar koyu bir balgam tükürüyor.{/n} "Yeni bir masala ne dersin şirinim? Bir varmış bir yokmuş, içi tıka basa kum dolu bir kayanın içinde yaşayan küçük bir kız varmış. Bu kayanın tam ortasında da {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} hizmetkârları için akla hayale gelmeyecek hazineler saklıymış. Kız kendisini bir kez olsun görmemiş, ismini asla bilmeyecek kişiler için o küçük elleriyle bu hazineleri çıkarır, sırtını paralar, ciğerleri çıkarcasına öksürürmüş. On altı yaşına basana kadar her günü böyle geçmiş. Sonra..."
languages.original_text: "So what do you want to hear, shereen? A children's tale about a beautiful princess? A ballad about a queen of thieves?" {n}Jae cringes at her own words and with all the crudeness of a veteran soldier spits on the floor.{/n} "How about a new story, shereen? Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name. She did this every day until she turned sixteen. And then..."

traits.locale_text: "Ne duymak istiyorsun peki şirinim? Güzel bir prenses hakkında bir çocuk masalı mı? Hırsızların kraliçesi hakkında içli bir şarkı mı?" {n}Bizzat kendi sözleri Jae'ın yüzünü ekşitmesine sebep oluyor ve yere, ancak deneyimli bir savaşçıdan beklenebilecek kadar koyu bir balgam tükürüyor.{/n} "Yeni bir masala ne dersin şirinim? Bir varmış bir yokmuş, içi tıka basa kum dolu bir kayanın içinde yaşayan küçük bir kız varmış. Bu kayanın tam ortasında da {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un hizmetkârları için akla hayale gelmeyecek hazineler bulunurmuş. Kız onu bir kez olsun görmemiş, onun ismini asla bilmeyecek kişiler için o küçük elleriyle bu hazineleri çıkarır, sırtını paralar, ciğerleri çıkarcasına öksürürmüş. On altı yaşına basana kadar her günü böyle geçmiş. Sonra..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
